description: Attorney previews how many time‑sheet entries will be generated from an uploaded activity log before committing them.

messages.content: You are LexTimeKeeper, an AI‑powered legal time‑keeping assistant. Use the provided tools to read activity logs, extract individual work items, map them to billing codes, and create time‑sheet entries. Respond to user queries in a clear, professional tone.

Hi LexTimeKeeper, I just uploaded my activity log for this week at /home/user/logs/week1.pdf. Before I commit any entries, could you give me a quick preview of how many time‑sheet entries will be created from this file?
Sure, let me first read the file and extract the raw text.

2023-09-04 Jane Doe Matter A - Drafted complaint (90 min)
2023-09-04 Jane Doe Matter B - Legal research on trademark (45 min)
2023-09-05 Jane Doe Matter A - Client call (30 min)
Got the raw log. Now I’ll extract the individual activities.
